Literature.Title: Polycationic gramicidin S analogues with both high antibiotic activity and very low hemolytic activity.
Literature.Author: Tamaki M, Harada T, Fujinuma K, Takanashi K, Shindo M, Kimura M, Uchida Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis NBRC 3513(MIC=100µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 19213(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis NBRC 12933(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 12732(MIC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 3080(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli NBRC 12734(MIC=>100µg/ml)
